action.action-desc: Mr. Ciscomani (for himself, Mr. Crane, Mrs. Lesko, Mr. Schweikert, Mr. Newhouse, and Mr. Baird) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Energy Act of 2020 to include copper as a critical mineral, and for other purposes.

section.header: Inclusion of copper as critical mineral
section.text: Section 7002(a)(3)(A) of the Energy Act of 2020 (30 U.S.C. 1606(a)(3)(A)) is amended to read as follows:

clause.text: any mineral, element, substance, or material designated as critical by the Secretary under subsection (c).
